descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700][size=4]Quick info[/size][/color]
This is my first mod ever, though I made a house mod for the purpose of training in the CK and to do other Skyrim related mods in the future. 
This is my very first creation I've published but PLEASE, report bugs / ideas, and anything you can imagine, this is a kind of beta-test after all. 

[color=#ff7700][size=4]Location / Content[/size][/color]
[size=2]The house is located in: Riverwood Trader on the ground floor, through a trapdoor. [/size]
In this cellar you can find different storaged items, books, journals and Lucan Valerius personal throne!
It also includes an alchemy table with nice view over Lucans' throne room. (With some random ingredients)

[color=#ff7700][size=4]Changelog / Updates[/size][/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ZyfzFi3.png[/img]
[b] - [color=#8e7cc3]0.6a[/color][/b]
[list][*][size=2]Published mod[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
[b] - [color=#8e7cc3]0.7a[/color][/b][/size][list][*][size=2]Added clutter[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Added general static entities to multiple rooms that felt "empty"[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Fixed wall glitches[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Added "Install with NMM" compatibility[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Pictures[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Secret Journals (Still in progress)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Better description[/size][/*]
[*][size=2][s]Added Exotic dancers[/s][/size][/*]
[*][size=2][s]Fixed Annoying Mannequins[/s][/size][/*]
[/list]
- [color=#8e7cc3]0.8a[/color]
[list][*][size=2]Fixed wrongly placed pillars and rocks.
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Added more attractive hallway.
[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Added Entries to Lucans' secret journal[/size][/*]
[/list]
- [color=#8e7cc3]0.9a[/color][size=2][list][*]Split house in sections with secret door.
[/*]
[*]Removed mannequins.
[/*]
[*]Added new section(Cave).
[/*]
[*]Overhaul and Full-Version release preparations.
[/*]
[/list]
[/size][u][b][color=#ff7700][size=4]Requirements.[/size][/color][/b][/u]
Base requirements and reasons.
-------------------------------------
This mod only requires base Skyrim as I've not used any of the DLCs.
Mod should not hopefully not conflict with any other mods, I've not edited any data(or used data from other mods) only duplicated main Skyrim data for own personal use.


[center]﻿Load order is irrelevant.[/center][center]--------------------
Please report bugs & ideas, any input is welcome.[/center][center]-----------------------------------
Have fun, hope you enjoy what I've done so far.[/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6FRftTH.png[/img]
author: Play4ever
